protocol.name: P-GSE16472-2
protocol.text: Isolated protoplasts (0.4 million) were incubated in 10 ml 0.5 M mannitol, 4 mM MES pH 5.7 and 20 mM KCl for 4 hr at 28oC before treatment with 100 nM flg22 for 30 min and 60 min.

protocol.name: P-GSE16472-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis plants (Col-0) were grown in a controlled room for 28 days at 22oC, 60% relative humidity, 75 uE light and 12 hr photoperiod.

protocol.name: P-GSE16472-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer’s protocol

protocol.name: P-GSE16472-5
protocol.text: Total RNA (1.5-4.5 µg) were amplified, biotinylated and fragmented using the BioArrayTM HighYieldTM RNA transcript labelling kit (Enzo) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE16472-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized on the Arabidopsis ATH1 GeneChips using the Affymetrix 640 Hybridization Oven. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE16472-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using GeneChip Scanner 7G with AutoLoader.

protocol.name: P-GSE16472-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed in FlexArray with RMA including background correction and normalization.
